attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0803

Date: 2016-09-21

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the salary, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:

 

Archibald, Bruce, President of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency, within the range ($221,300 - $260,300), effective April 1, 2016;
